__e: Kanoe is gathering the forces of the Dragon of the Earth... to destroy this planet.
And I don't need your help.
That you must be a Dragon of the Earth.
That you must be a Dragon of the Earth.
And I don't need your help.
Your fire-breathing wife came around, is what happened.
Most of my dreams involve a flying dragon that's trying to eat the house, but then I ride him to the moon, and we jam out on our guitars.
I'd have told you this before, but that old G-woman of mine...
You say a dragon did this?
Please, two minutes. I'll kill a dragon. My life will get infinitely better.
First there's a dragon. Now he tells me money talks.
I know what you did to The Dragon, and you are not going to harm anyone here.
But if you Green Dragon, at least you somebody.
All this time, my sister was using you to get to the Green Dragon, but it was you all along.
Um... I thought you said the whole family was murdered by the Green Dragon?
Before long ... every soul in Middle Earth will know the Dragon is dead.
Because mark my words that dragon is still out there.
He knows his dragon is still out there.
It means "Red Dragon." Mean anything to you?
The Red Dragon needs to be able to find this place, if he wants to.
From that moment on, the red dragon hates the woman... and declares war on her and all of her children.
